name: Design Landing Page
description: Create a visually appealing landing page for the website. Utilize modern design principles to enhance user engagement.

name: Implement User Authentication
description: Integrate user authentication functionality using JWT. Enhance security and user access control for the application.

name: Write Technical Blog Post
description: Draft a technical blog post on a relevant industry topic. Share insights and knowledge to engage the target audience effectively.

name: Optimize Database Queries
description: Improve the efficiency of database queries for better performance. Optimize data retrieval and processing workflows.

name: Conduct UI/UX Workshop
description: Organize a workshop to discuss UI/UX best practices. Foster collaboration and knowledge sharing among team members.

name: Review Code Pull Requests
description: Review and provide feedback on code pull requests from team members. Ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.

name: Create Social Media Graphics
description: Design graphics for social media posts to promote upcoming events. Create visually appealing content to boost online presence.

name: Test Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: Perform testing to ensure the website is compatible with various browsers. Identify and address compatibility issues for a seamless user experience.

name: Prepare Monthly Report
description: Compile and analyze data for the monthly project report. Summarize key insights and achievements for stakeholders.

name: Set Up Continuous Integration
description: Configure continuous integration for automated testing and deployment. Streamline the development process for increased efficiency.
